title: Scripter found

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body: Okay this might sound like a stupid rant but I'm pretty sure that  this guy is scripting just wait let me explain. Just not too long ago I was in a ranked game and I came across this player "kangkangsama", who played "Karthus" top which didn't at all look fishy at any point however as few minutes went by into the game a friend of mine who was against him on top calls out "WHOA this guy must either be a ***king GOD or a cheesy scripter", at this point I had a quick peep up there and  realized our jungle who was  Poppy decides to gank this Karthus however as I watch this tremendous gank going on I realized that the Karthus was constantly toggling his e at max range as if we've stepped on a trip wire with an automatic sensor however that wasn't all. Poppy decides to solo dragon the place was secured with at least 3 pinks and 2 sensor to make sure that it wasn't warded and he initiates as we secured dragon without haste the poppy continues to take jungle creeps but a sudden ult from Karthus fell upon summoners rift and BOOM goes Poppy into heaven she goes without a word she calls out "Lucky". This was just way too fishy so 3 minutes after that incident I decided to go and aggro the golem to hit me but as my hp slowly disappeared from taking free damage I hear the tune of Karthus humming through my headset and the next thing you know I'm dead. From that I can be 101% sure that he was scripting for sure not only that what kind of Karthus places the wall of pain directly on his enemy every single time yup that's right him, scripts. I know that this won't do anything at all however I just wanna put awareness for people who might come across this guy because his attitude was a load of rubbish not only was he just spamming the words "LOL", "EZ" and "GIT GUD" this is what triggered me so excuse my silly rant that I wanted to share thanks.

replies.body:
In addition, could you please tell riot via a support ticket instead of naming and shaming on the boards...

-LostFr0st
I dont think so guys, I met him in soloq we duoed a few game he was really bad at few champs he only champs he could play was ryze and karthas. stop being BUTT hurt OP.
I would recommend sending a rito ticket since the boards isn't really gonna do anything for this kind of thing.
You might want to include the actual replay in the post you send to Riot, you can download it [here](http://www.replay.gg/).
I looked at his match history and he's only played 3 ranked games as Karthus in the past 2 weeks and none of them had a poppy playing. You sure you got everything right?
Refresh it, was played game two hours ago.
Oh yes now I se it
